title: BindingOfDuty
description: Obligation control requiring that a single actor who initiates a task must also complete it, preventing task hijacking or inconsistent workflow state that could be exploited by a different actor. Complements SeparationOfDuty by enforcing task continuity rather than task segregation. Anchored to NIST SP 800-53 CM-5 (Access Restrictions for Change) and workflow integrity controls.

scope.description: Organizational or operational boundary within which this binding of duty constraint applies (e.g., a project, department, or system).
